items.title: Lucius Malfoy Star Reveals Which Hogwarts House He Belongs To In Real Life, & The Response Will Have Harry Potter Fans Giddy
items.description: Lucius Malfoy actor Jason Isaacs reveals which Hogwarts house he belongs to in real life, and Harry Potter fans will be pleased with his answer.

items.title: 10 Incredible Movie Scores From The Last Decade That Don't Get Enough Love
items.description: From ambitious blockbusters to dark thrillers, the right soundtrack can elevate a film and become part of the story, yet many can be underappreciated.

items.title: CinemaCon 2025 Live Blog: Day 4
items.description: Follow along with SR for live updates on CinemaCon, the annual movie theater industry convention. The final day is ending with Paramount and Disney!
